death_text: m_c was murdered. The culprit is unknown.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was secretly murdered by r_c.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer.

death_text: m_c was murdered. r_c stands over them, blood dripping from their pelt.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer.

death_text: m_c was murdered by r_c in cold blood.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer.

death_text: m_c was murdered by r_c in cold blood. r_c has made the death look accidental.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was secretly murdered by r_c, who made the death look accidental.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer, who made the death look accidental.

death_text: r_c killed m_c by feeding them deathberries.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c, who fed them deathberries.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer with deathberries.

death_text: r_c killed m_c by feeding them foxglove seeds.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c, who fed them foxglove seeds.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer with foxglove seeds.

death_text: r_c killed m_c by feeding them nightshade berries.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c, who fed them nightshade berries.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer with nightshade berries.

death_text: r_c killed m_c by feeding them water hemlock.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c, who fed them water hemlock.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer with water hemlock.

death_text: r_c killed m_c by consciously giving them the wrong herbs.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c, who purposefully fed them the wrong herbs.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was murdered by an unknown killer, by being fed incorrect herbs.

death_text: m_c was found dead near a fox den.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by a fox.

death_text: m_c was bitten by a snake, and succumbed to the venom.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by a snake.

death_text: m_c saved a kit from a snake, but was bitten in the process. The venom killed them.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by a snake, while saving a kit.

death_text: m_c went missing, and was found dead out in the territory.

history_text.reg_death: m_c went missing, and was found dead.

death_text: m_c was found dead near the o_c border.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was found dead near the o_c border.

death_text: o_c attempted to break into the camp. m_c and r_c are left cold on the ground in the aftermath.

history_text.reg_death: This cat died when o_c tried to break into camp.
history_text.lead_death: tried to defend the Clan from o_c

death_text: o_c attempted to break into the camp. m_c died defending the nursery, r_c huddled beneath {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cooling body.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died defending r_c from o_c warriors.

death_text: m_c was burnt alive while trying to save r_c from a fire.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed in a fire while trying to save r_c.

death_text: m_c died after catching greencough.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of greencough.

death_text: m_c died from infected wounds.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from infected wounds.

death_text: m_c and r_c die from eating tainted prey.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from eating tainted prey.

death_text: m_c fell into the river and r_c drowned alongside m_c while trying to rescue them.

history_text.reg_death: m_c drowned alongside a Clanmate.

death_text: m_c and r_c are killed by a gang of rogues.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by a gang of rogues.
history_text.lead_death: was killed by a gang of rogues

death_text: r_c and m_c die of greencough.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of greencough.

death_text: r_c and m_c die of yellowcough.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of yellowcough.

death_text: A bad case of greencough strikes the Clan, taking r_c and m_c's lives.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of greencough.

death_text: m_c has always wondered where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/sneak/sneaks} out of camp, intending to find loners who might have some clues about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} origins. Frantic with worry and confusion after finding m_c's empty nest in the morning, they launch a search. c_n finds {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cooling body after a long search and wonders why {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} decided to leave the safety of the c_n, and what killed {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

history_text.reg_death: Curiosity killed this cat.
history_text.lead_death: lost a life because of curiosity.
